issue.title: [CF 139] Hiding icons that meta icons are based on?
issue.body:
Is there a way to do this? Basically I have a meta icon that displays my warrior abilities in order of priority and don't want the individual icons to be simultaneously displayed.


> Posted by CurseForge user CodeNameSly | Imported from CurseForge issue #139 | Raw

comments.body:
Check the "Fake Hidden" box in the alpha tab/dialog.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
